content: Write a short summary of the movie "Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle"

"Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle" is an adventurous fantasy film that follows four high school students who discover an old video game console featuring the game Jumanji. When they start playing, they are magically transported into the game's jungle setting and transformed into the adult avatars they've chosen. Spencer becomes the brave Dr. Smolder Bravestone, Fridge turns into the diminutive zoologist Franklin "Mouse" Finbar, Martha is transformed into the athletic Ruby Roundhouse, and Bethany becomes the cartographer Professor Sheldon "Shelly" Oberon. 

The group quickly realizes that they must work together to survive the dangerous world of Jumanji and return to the real world. They face numerous challenges, including dangerous animals, villainous characters, and the game's various obstacles, all while learning valuable lessons about friendship and self-discovery. Throughout their journey, they must complete the game by returning a magical jewel to its rightful place and calling out "Jumanji" to escape the game's grasp and return home. The film blends humor, action, and heart, making it a thrilling and entertaining experience.
